data.name: Rogue Frontiers
data.detailed_description:
A challenging game of adventure and survival for you and your friends, set in a beautifully hand-crafted world with a variety of locations, challenges, and creatures. Fight, craft, build, and survive through an adventure destined to be one of your favorites!

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Explore a world shrouded in mystery. Discover distinct environments with unique enemies to battle, resources to gather and secrets to uncover! Search unknown lands and fight bloodthirsty monsters.

DEFEND YOUR STRONGHOLD
Build bases that offer reprieve from the dangers ahead. Customize buildings, both inside and out, with a detailed building system. Progress through building tiers to upgrade, expand and defend your base. Defend your base versus the denizens of the night who do not want you on their land!

GATHER, CRAFT AND SURVIVE
Struggle to survive as you gather materials and craft weapons, armor, tools, and defenses. Decorate your home and enhance your weapons, grow crops and vegetables, prepare food, brew drinks and potions, and progress as you defeat more difficult bosses and discover new things to craft.

KEY FEATURES:
  • Massive hand-crafted world where every area is immersive and distinct, with unique enemies, and resources.
  • Play alone or with up to 32 players on player-hosted dedicated servers and experience enemies that scale in difficulty.
  • Play across seven unique biomes each with its own special components to gather, monsters to fight, and dungeons to explore.
  • Stamina based combat that rewards preparation and skill. Utilize weapon types with unique attacks, different blocking styles, ranged combat, dodges and parries to fight your enemies.
  • Rewarding food system where you cannot starve and are not punished for not eating, instead you gain health, stamina and regeneration buffs depending on what foods you consume.
  • Flexible building system that takes structural integrity into account. Build a small shelter or an entire village, make outposts or claim abandoned buildings as your own. Then customize to your liking.
  • Epic boss fights that will test even the best prepared warriors and offer rewards that help you on your journey.

data.short_description: A challenging game of adventure and survival for you and your friends, set in a beautifully hand-crafted world with a variety of locations, challenges, and creatures. Fight, craft, build, and survive through an adventure destined to be one of your favorites!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.0
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce any model or equivelant
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Rogue Frontiers is a fantasy survival game and may contain situations which are difficult to participate in such as murder of virtual people or the killing of virtual animals,
